author: chibidrawing

text:
Funny.  I've been thinking about this game and the 3DS lately.  Unlike the gameboy color and the DS for the most part, it has an awesome sound chip.

I can only imagine the possible sequels to my favorite franchises.  My favorite franchises that have always been limited sound wise being able to have more wiggle room and really explore.  Koshiro did it with EO4 clearly.  Imagine Ace Attorney or Advance Wars or even Pokemon.

author: detectivekr

text:
Lolwut ?

EO3 is better than the first one by far, the second one is still the best (well, i don't really know better music than petal bridge...), but EO3 got some kickass boss themes (way better than others EO special boss themes), some good donjon music (the first strate, the third one and the fifth one) + the battle theme ,and the music when you're on the see, who is my fav , you really feel you're on adventure.

author: Matt 6418

text: After using FM synths for the first 3 games, Koshiro went with live﻿ instruments for EO4. As much as I liked﻿ the first 2 games' soundtrack, I was very disappointed by the music in EO3. Thankfully, this has great music. It makes me want to play the game and hear it in-game while exploring the dungeon, it's quite hard to imagine this track getting interrupted by battles though !
author: SupraDarky
